query:
INSERT INTO room_types (name, nameEn, description, descriptionEn, capacity, basePrice, holidayPrice, images, facilities, isAvailable, displayOrder, createdAt, updatedAt) VALUES
('豪華雙人房', 'Luxury Double Room', '寬敞舒適的豪華雙人房，配備高級設施', 'Spacious and comfortable luxury double room with premium facilities', 2, 1880, 2280, '["https://res.cloudinary.com/dqhct1qfx/image/upload/w_500,h_400,c_fill,q_auto,f_auto/v1/hotel/luxury-double"]', '["免費Wi-Fi","平面電視","迷你吧"]', 1, 1, NOW(), NOW()),
('標準雙人房', 'Standard Double Room', '舒適的標準雙人房，適合商務旅客', 'Comfortable standard double room, suitable for business travelers', 2, 1280, 1580, '["https://res.cloudinary.com/dqhct1qfx/image/upload/w_500,h_400,c_fill,q_auto,f_auto/v1/hotel/standard-double"]', '["免費Wi-Fi","平面電視"]', 1, 2, NOW(), NOW()),
('豪華四人房', 'Luxury Quad Room', '寬敞的豪華四人房，適合家庭入住', 'Spacious luxury quad room, suitable for family stays', 4, 2880, 3480, '["https://res.cloudinary.com/dqhct1qfx/image/upload/w_500,h_400,c_fill,q_auto,f_auto/v1/hotel/luxury-quad"]', '["免費Wi-Fi","平面電視","迷你吧","廚房"]', 1, 3, NOW(), NOW()),
('標準四人房', 'Standard Quad Room', '舒適的標準四人房，適合家庭旅遊', 'Comfortable standard quad room, suitable for family vacations', 4, 2280, 2880, '["https://res.cloudinary.com/dqhct1qfx/image/upload/w_500,h_400,c_fill,q_auto,f_auto/v1/hotel/standard-quad"]', '["免費Wi-Fi","平面電視"]', 1, 4, NOW(), NOW()),
('家庭房', 'Family Room', '寬敞的家庭房，可容納6人，適合大家庭', 'Spacious family room accommodating 6 people, suitable for large families', 6, 3880, 4680, '["https://res.cloudinary.com/dqhct1qfx/image/upload/w_500,h_400,c_fill,q_auto,f_auto/v1/hotel/family"]', '["免費Wi-Fi","平面電視","廚房","客廳"]', 1, 5, NOW(), NOW()),
('單人房', 'Single Room', '精緻的單人房，適合商務旅客', 'Elegant single room, suitable for business travelers', 1, 880, 1080, '["https://res.cloudinary.com/dqhct1qfx/image/upload/w_500,h_400,c_fill,q_auto,f_auto/v1/hotel/single"]', '["免費Wi-Fi","平面電視"]', 1, 6, NOW(), NOW());
